data.name: ksAlternateForms
data.value: Select the form to merge the current allomorph into:

data.name: ksBUG
data.comment: title for message box

data.name: ksCannotFindObject
data.value: Could not find the correct object to jump to.
data.comment: error message displayed in message box

data.name: ksCannotMoveObjectToCopy
data.value: Do not know how to move this object to a new copy of its owner.
data.comment: error message displayed in message box

data.name: ksDeletedObject
data.comment: displayed in status bar

data.name: ksDeleteX
data.comment: Title of delete confirmation dialog box

data.name: ksEntries
data.value: Select the entry to merge the current entry into:

data.name: ksFindRelatedWords
data.comment: message box title

data.name: ksGlosses
data.value: Select the gloss to merge the current gloss into:

data.name: ksMergeXIntoSelection
data.value: "{0}" will be merged into what you select above,{1}resulting in one item.
data.comment: {1} is a line separator character

data.name: ksMergeXIntoY
data.value: "{0}" will be merged into "{1}",{2}resulting in one item.
data.comment: {2} is a line separator character

data.name: ksNoEntriesWithSameSemanticDomain
data.value: Sorry, no other entries were found with the same semantic domain(s) as that entry.

data.name: ksNoSemanticDomainsListedForEntry
data.value: Sorry, no semantic domains are listed for any of the senses of that entry, and no lexical relations (or cross references) include that entry or any of its senses. Without these, we cannot find related entries.

data.name: ksProgramError
data.comment: title for message box

data.name: ksSenses
data.value: Select the sense to merge the current sense into:

data.name: ksShow
data.comment: button text

data.name: ksTemplateTooDeep
data.value: A discourse chart template can only have three levels (template, column group, and column).

data.name: kstidFindRelWordsNotInDict
data.value: Sorry, that entry is not yet in the dictionary
data.comment: Displayed in message box when Find Related Words can't find any related words

data.name: kstidFindRelWordsTitle
data.comment: Title for message box when Find Related Words can't find any related words

data.name: ksWordsRelatedBySemanticDomain
data.value: Words related by semantic domain to {0}:
data.comment: {0} is a vernacular word

data.name: ksLexicallyRelatedWords
data.value: These words are lexically related to {0}:
data.comment: {0} is a vernacular word

data.name: ksMarkupTagsTooDeep
data.value: The Text Markup Tags list can only have two levels (tag types and tags).

data.name: ksHierarchyLimit
data.comment: Title for Chart Template or Markup Tag list warnings

data.name: ksDuplicateWordformsMsg
data.value: FieldWorks has detected that there are two wordforms with the form {0}. This is not supposed to happen! If you can figure out how it came about please let the developers know. It would be good to manually delete all but one of them. In the meantime, here is the information on the first of them.

data.name: ksCtrlClick
data.comment: String (typcially with leading space) that gets appended to one item in certain right-click menus to indicate the one that will be activated by ctrl-click.

data.name: ksDeleteFileAlso
data.value: The FieldWorks internal copy of this file ({0}) is not used elsewhere in the project. Would you like to delete it also? (This cannot be undone!)
data.comment: Used in deleting pictures, sounds,...

data.name: ksRemoveThisFeature
data.comment: Used in phoneme bulk edit for assigning phonological features to phonemes; when selected, the targeted feature will be removed from the list of features used by this phoneme.

data.name: ksCannotDeleteItem
data.value: Sorry, FieldWorks cannot delete this item.

data.name: ksCannotDeleteWordform
data.value: Sorry, FieldWorks cannot delete this wordform because it occurs in your texts.

data.name: ksCantDeleteDefaultDiscourseTemplate
data.value: The default discourse chart template cannot be deleted, moved or promoted.
data.comment: Error message attempting to delete the one and only discourse chart template. Same message is used for moving or promoting.

data.name: ksCantDeleteLastTagList
data.value: The last remaining Text Markup tag list cannot be deleted.
data.comment: Error message attempting to delete the one and only text markup tag type.

data.name: ksCantDeleteMarkupTagInUse
data.value: You cannot delete a Text Markup tag when there are texts using the tag. One such text using this tag is {0}.
data.comment: {0} is (one) text that prevents the delete.

data.name: ksCantDeleteMarkupTypeInUse
data.value: You cannot delete a Text Markup type when there are texts using its tags. One such text using this type of tag is {0}.
data.comment: {0} is (one) text that prevents the delete.

data.name: ksCantModifyTemplateInUse
data.value: This part of a chart template cannot be moved or deleted, because it or one of its children is in use in one or more charts (e.g., {0}).
data.comment: {0} is the title of a text, or possibly a scripture reference.

data.name: kstidOfferToRestore
data.value: There was a problem opening the current version of the file {0}, dated {1}. Would you like to open the automatic backup, {2}, dated {3}?

data.name: kstidProblemOpeningFile
data.comment: Caption for error dialog

data.name: ksCannotDeleteWordformBecauseOfAnnotations
data.value: Sorry, FieldWorks cannot delete this wordform because there are parsing annotations attached. Please invoke "Remove Parser annotations" in Tools > Utilities first.
